transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir Shri Nath Herbal se baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Sir very good afternoon Pravesh Sharma baat kar raha tha India Mart office Noida se.
Customer: Ji sir bataiye sir.
Executive: Sir aapka na call aaya tha morning mein kuch tender related kuch issue aap face kar rahe the thoda mujhe batate sir main kaise help kar paunga aapki.
Customer: Sir maine aloe vera aloe vera ka tender consume kiya tha ek aloe vera lotion ka.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ji. Jo Hoshiarpur Punjab se hai military ka.
Executive: Ji. Ji.
Customer: Uske liye wo wo mere ko usme participate karna hai mere ko kaise karunga mere ko pata nahi hai.
Executive: Sir main aapko do cheeze bata deta hu actually tender kya hota hai na sir tender hota hai jaise badi badi government firms hogi badi firms hogi to bidding karwani hai right sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To tender pehle sir aapko yaad hoga pehle offline fill hote the document submit karwane padte the wo newspaper stall pe aapko wo poster milte the matlab wo paper pe milte the ispe likha hota tha tender available hai.
Customer: Ji ji sir.
Executive: Right sir abhi sir sara online process jab aapne ye tender consume kara to iske sath na ek PDF aaya hoga aapke pass.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: PDF ke PDF ke andar na sir isme pura likha hota hai ki isko aapko kaise fill karna hai kya website hai kya steps hai.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Wo PDF PDF aapko padhna padega iske sath mein government website ek government portal hota hai jisme aapko ek ID banani padti hai.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Jab wo aap ID bana lenge wo ID mein aapka thoda authentication hota hai aapki aap ye first time tender fill kar rahe hain ya pehle bhi fill kar rahe hain sir.
Customer: First time kar rahe ho sir isliye to mere ko chakkar pad raha hai mere ko pata nahi hai na idea.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: To isme na ek kaam aap kariye dekhiye sir tender ka information to aapko PDF mein mil jayega jo bhi tender aap uthayenge consume karenge theek hai sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Aap aap youtube pe daliye sir how to fill tender.
Customer: Aap aapko ek tutorial video aa jayega pura isme na sir pe dalu kya.
Executive: Nahi India Mart pe nahi aap youtube pe daliye.
Customer: How to fill tender.
Executive: How to fill government tender.
Customer: How to fill government tender.
Executive: Usme na aapke pass do teen kyuki sir dekhiye hame bhi itna knowledge nahi hai hame bas itna hota hai ki ha PDF padh ke hum bata dete hain us PDF mein likha hota hai ki tender kab matlab launch hua hai kab uska expiry date hai wo tender mein kya product ka requirement hai aur tender kaise fill karna hai jo fill hoga sab kuch online hoga sir offline kuch bhi nahi hota.
Customer: Online hoga.
Executive: Ha sab kuch online hoga aur ye matlab aap matlab pehli bari mein karna bada tough hi hota hai matlab jo maine suna hai thoda bahut aap ek bar isme ek ID banti hai sir aapki ek portal hota hai government ka waha pe ja ha waha pe.
Customer: Ha ji.
Customer: Mere ko pata nahi sir isme kaun sa portal hai usme.
Executive: Sir hame bhi nahi pata isiliye maine aapko bola aap na ek bar youtube pe video daliye how to fill tender aapko panch che video mil jayenge how to fill government tender usme aapko pura detail mein bata denge dikha ke right sir baki tender ka information to dikh gaya na sir aapko PDF to dikh gaya aapko jahan se aapne consume kara.
Customer: Ha PDF to dikh gaya.
Executive: PDF ko na sir ha us PDF mein pehle padh lijiyega us dekhiye waise jo tender aap hum wahi tender dikhate hain jisme din bache ho hum expire tender dikhate hi nahi hai yaha pe aap aap pehle tender ka pura na eligibility criteria padh lijiyega waha pe usme saat aath page ka PDF hoga aapki company eligible hai ya nahi hai usme kuch hota hai clause hota hai turnover ka bhi clause hota hai aur ek clause hota hai sir matlab uska ki aapka matlab jo product hai quality measures ka matlab kuch ISI certification to nahi mang rahe hain wo samajh rahe hain sir.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji sir.
Executive: To ye sara padh lijiyega baki kuch help rahe to ye direct number hai mera Pravesh Sharma naam hai mujhe call kijiyega agar rahega to video call karke main bhi aapki help kar dunga agar aapko usme kuch rahega matlab samajhne ka rahega right sir iske iske alava to sir koi concern issue nahi hai iske alava to kuch problem nahi hai.
Customer: No no no iske alava koi problem nahi hai.
Executive: Main aapke aapke number pe na sir aapko whatsapp pe hi likh ke bhej raha hu abhi theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Kuch bhi problem rehta hai mujhe dalega aur ye concern aapka close kar raha hu sir jo ye tender se related tha theek hai sir ek feedback milega feedback jarur dalega Pravesh Sharma.
Customer: Theek hai thank you sir okay sir thank you sir.
Executive: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Needs help participating in a tender.



Resolution:

- Explained tender process and eligibility criteria.

- Suggested watching tutorial videos on YouTube.

- Offered direct contact for further assistance.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to check PDF and YouTube tutorials.

- Executive to send a 'Hi' on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- tender, youtube, pdf, eligibility
